issue.title: [CI] Small improvements to CI documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16373](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16373). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We sometimes use "on-demand" to refer to more comprehensive jobs, some of which are run as part of the nightly builds. A more suitable description would be _extended_ instead of {_}on-demand{_}.
